ezvcard.property.Email

  • Packages that use Email 
    Package Description
    ezvcard  
    ezvcard.io.scribe
    Contains classes that know how to marshal and unmarshal a property in each vCard format.
    ezvcard.property
    Contains the DTO class for each property.
